content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) with a wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) for iron ore extraction.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) to transfer items into the stone furnace.

### Coal Extraction and Processing Facility at Position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) with a wooden chest at position (41.5, -80.5) for coal extraction.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) for processing iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) to transfer items into the stone furnace.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items with insufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. This will prevent errors related to insufficient inventory when inserting items.

### Errors when attempting to insert iron ore into a coal furnace
- Verify that the target furnace is intended for the type of material you are inserting. Inserting iron ore into a coal furnace may not be appropriate unless the furnace is configured to handle multiple material types.
